text: The 1979 Virginia Senate elections were held on November 6, 1979, alongside the Virginia House of Delegates election. All 40 seats in the Senate of Virginia were up for election. ==Overall results== {| style="width:60%; text- align:center;" |+ ↓ |- style="color:white;" | style="background:blue; width:75.0%;" | 30 | style="background:red; width:25.0%;" | 10 |- | Democratic | Republican |} {| class=wikitable ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center rowspan= 2 colspan=2| Parties ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center colspan=4| Seats ! style="background-color:#E9E9E9" align=center colspan=3| Popular Vote |- ! align=center | 1975 ! align=center | 1979 ! align=center | +/- ! align=center | Strength ! align=center | Vote ! align=center | % ! align=center | Change |- |align=left|Democratic | align=right | 35 | align=right | 30 | align=right | 5 | align=right | 75.00% | align=right | 625,023 | align=right | 63.53% | align=right | 6.09% |- |align=left|Republican | align=right | 5 | align=right | 10 | align=right | 5 | align=right | 25.00% | align=right | 346,137 | align=right | 35.18% | align=right | 8.99% |- | Independent | align=right | 0 | align=right | 0 | align=right | | align=right | 0.00% | align=right | 11,988 | align=right | 1.22% | align=right | 2.95% |- | - | Write-ins | align=right | 0 | align=right | 0 | align=right | | align=right | 0.00% | align=right | 680 | align=right | 0.07% | align=right | 0.04% |- ! align=center colspan="2" |Total ! align=center | 40 ! align=center | 40 ! align=center | 0 ! align=center | 100.00% ! align=center | 983,828 ! align=center | 100.00% ! align=center | - |} == See also == * United States elections, 1979 * Virginia elections, 1979 ** Virginia House of Delegates election, 1979 ==References== Virginia Category:1979 Virginia elections Category:Virginia General Assembly elections
